H0.text: Battery is the main source of the electromagnetic energy we use.

H1.text: Wind is the main source of the electromagnetic energy we use.

H2.text: The sun is the main source of the electromagnetic energy we use.

H3.text: Coal is the main source of the electromagnetic energy we use.

A4.text: Although solar energy refers primarily to the use of solar radiation for practical ends, all types of renewable energy, other than geothermal power and tidal power, are derived either directly or indirectly from the Sun.
